propose.from sentence: In this paper we propose a novel class of memory augmented neural networks called Neural Semantic Encoders ( NSE ) for natural language understanding .

has.from sentence: NSE has a variable sized encoding memory which allows the model to access entire input sequence during the reading process ; therefore efficiently delivering long - term dependencies overtime .

supports.from sentence: NSE sequentially processes the input and supports word compositionality inheriting both temporal and hierarchical nature of human language .

NSE.read from and write to: set of relevant encoding memories simultaneously

access.from sentence: NSE can read from and write to a set of relevant encoding memories simultaneously or multiple NSEs can access a shared encoding memory effectively supporting knowledge and representation sharing .

encoding memory.from sentence: The encoding memory evolves overtime and maintains the memory of the input sequence through read , compose and write operations .
